page.title: 03RETAIL (continue)
page.content: animal foodstuffs & coal, a bicycle & video shop, Mullins the basket store & Sindell the chemists. There is one barber and two hairdressers, radio and television and electrical repair specialists, builders and decorators, car mechanics and of course Neslings Garage offering a full range of motor services.There are two part-time banks a building society and the Co-op will bank sums of money for its customers. Most of the shops are in or around the old market square on the hill. Previously, many of the then more numerous shops were down the hill to- wards the bridge, but with the build- ing of more houses and better parking facilities trade has shifted towards the centre.
